column5: Hey guys I will be fishing Lake Muskoka this weekend. Where should I be looking for them are they in the same spots as in the spring shallow and weeds?  Thanks
They probably would be shallow and fishing around any cover would be good. I've caught pike around sunken islands, rock pilings, etc.
Big and slow depending on water temps.  I'd be concentrating on the breaks and the rock/weedline transitions.
